price: 23. en dehors d’Allah. Conduisez-les vers la voie (menant à) la Fournaise !
arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَٱهۡدُوهُمۡ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: min dūni al-lahi fa-ih'dūhum ilā ṣirāṭi al-jaḥīmi
